<small>Hebrew form: [[H4093]]</small>
 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מַנְדַּע‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==knowledge, power of knowing== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7‎</span><sup>**J**</sup></lookup> ***id.***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַדָּע]]late); compare 'Mandâ' = <span class="bdbLangGreek">γνῶσις</span>, <lookup onclick="bdbabb('Nö')">Nö<sup>M xx</sup>); — absolute [[Dan.5.12|Dan 5:12]] emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דְּעָא‎</span>- [[Dan.2.21|Dan 2:21]] suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דְּעִי‎</span>- [[Dan.4.31|Dan 4:31]]; [[Dan.4.33|Dan 4:33]].
